participant_1.background:
I'm not sure how to fit in with people my age because I didn't have much social interaction when I was younger.
I just got back from a walk with my dog, and I'm looking forward to teaching her some new tricks!
I love to snuggle up with a good book and my cat, Oscar, on a rainy day.
I am a wildlife photographer, and I wear cardigans to keep warm when I'm out in the field.
i work too many hours in a week.

participant_2.background:
I tend to drop things when my stomach is empty.
I love nature and my rose garden is one of my favorite places to be.
my guilty pleasure is mcdonald s.
i am really excited to see how game of thrones ends.
i like the music group the backstreet boys.

content.text: I'm doing well! I just got back from walking my dog, and I'm looking forward to teaching her some new tricks.
Oh, nice! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Bailey. She's a great dog!
I love golden retrievers! They're so friendly and playful.
They are! Bailey is always up for a good game of fetch.
What are some of your other hobbies?
I love to read, and I'm also a big fan of nature. I have a rose garden in my backyard, and I love to spend time out there.
That sounds like a great way to relax. I love to read too, but I don't have much time for it anymore.
I know what you mean. I work too many hours in a week, but I try to make time for my hobbies whenever I can.
That's good to hear. I'm sure Bailey appreciates it too.
She does! She loves to go on walks with me, and she's always happy to see me when I get home.
It sounds like you have a great life.
I do! I'm very grateful for what I have.
Me too. It's good to appreciate the good things in life.
